content: Here’s the deal, sweetheart. I’ve been writing seriously for 32 years, have a bunch of books, was an NPR commentator for a decade and just got an okay review in the New York Times Sunday Book Review section. The only relationship that matters for a writer is with her/his writing. All the rest of it is distraction. And your reaction has nothing to do with the writing and everything to do with your history and patterned responses. Check out my website for more on this theme: http://www.breakthroughwriting.net Mary Sojourner
